turns.text: Well tell me about your home

turns.text: Which you might call it So we dont have big yard Uh but uh when my wife and I first moved in it was just the two of us So it was enough
Uh and its uh I guess what they call story and half Because its not full two story

turns.text: Where you know everything on top is on bottom So its got real high ceilings on half the house and the other half is just standard sized ceilings
And uh its about five year old house now

And as I look out the window of my trailer I can envision all the insulation thats going up today

turns.label: sd

turns.label: sd

turns.text: And uh see the the the state has law that says you cannot borrow the money to build your own home
turns.label: sd

turns.text: - - is that so I didnt know that
You can borrow the money to pay somebody else to build your house but you cant borrow the money to build your own
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well that sounds kind of dumb
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Well its to protect the the banks from guys that say yeah I want to build my own house and go out build spec home --

turns.text: -- and then it doesnt sell and then the banks --

turns.text: Wow Thats nice Thats real nice

Yeah Well I took lot of time in choosing this site --

Oh you you you dont plan on putting any any of that in
